Senior Data Scientist

Your role:

Data Scientists will strengthen our digital business unit, which drives the digital transformation for our company globally and across business divisions – leveraging cutting edge technology to reach new customers, improve operational efficiency, and to create entirely new business models.

A Senior Data Scientist is expected to lead small project teams in the execution of our projects. These teams execute the mathematical modeling of our business problems, develop algorithms and applications to solve these problems, and help our internal customers to understand and implement the results.

Who you are:

For the Senior Data Scientist position we are considering experienced candidates with high analytical problem-solving skills. A strong interest in scientific and technical work is required. Candidates are expected to quickly develop consulting capabilities on the job, with the ability to communicate effectively in an international team environment.

  • Ph.D. or MSc degree in Mathematics or Theoretical Physics preferred
  • At least four years of professional experience outside academia
  • Strong in mathematics and statistics
  • Software development experience
  • Proven leadership skills or project management expertise
  • Leadership skills to guide a project team from a commercial, technical and scientific perspective
  • Learn new mathematical or technical methods quickly and with little guidance
  • High energy, clear goal orientation and strong work ethic; “can do” attitude
  • Ability to deliver clear, concise presentations to non-scientific audiences
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Technical experience is required in at least some of the following areas:
    • Mathematical modeling, for example in: TensorFlow, MatLab, or R
    • Programming: Java, Python, C++, JavaScript
    • Software architectures: n-tier, SOA
    • Database servers, for example: SAP HANA, Hadoop, Sybase ASE / ASA, ORACLE, MS SQL Server, IBM DB2
    • Database programming: SQL, PL/SQL, T-SQL
    • Data warehousing/reporting/ETL, for example SAP BusinessObjects
    • Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint)

Job Requisition ID: 176699
Location: St. Louis
Career Level: D - Professional (4-9 years)
Working time model: full-time


Job Segment: Database, Scientist, Oracle, Consulting, ERP, Technology, Science
